author: andschwa
body:
As a requirement, the monad submodule was updated with PowerShell/psl-monad#17, and the Get/Set-ExecutionPolicy tests were updated to reflect the behavior. These were the remaining known code paths that had unguarded calls into the registry.

@PowerShell/linux Review please.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @palladia rebase on top of this to get updated monad :smile:

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Approved.  Did we decide we won't support ExecutionPolicy on non-Windows platforms?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: No, but we don't currently support it, so it made no sense as it was. (Although they're leaning toward not supporting it.)

title: Remove registry stub
